ing: 1 large head cabbage, cored and sliced thin
des: "This is a simple cabbage recipe with sour cream my grandmother taught me."
ins: Bring water to boil in a large pot; add cabbage, and cook for 6 to 8 minutes. Drain water, reduce heat to low, and return cabbage to stovetop.  Stir in sour cream, caraway seeds, and salt; cook over low heat for 15 minutes.
